mapper.update: update mf_th set status = 1 where lsh = #{lsh} and status = 0
update mf_th set status = 9 where lsh = #{lsh} and status = 0

update mf_th set hh=#{hh},sl=#{sl},lx=#{lx},province=#{province},city=#{city}, district=#{district},location=#{location},phone=#{phone},contact=#{contact},remark=#{remark}, qwsj=#{qwsj} where lsh = #{lsh} and status = 0
update mf_th set status = '2', psdh = #{psdh}, driver_code = #{driver}, path_code = #{path} where lsh = #{lsh} and status = '1'
update mf_th set status = '1', psdh = null, driver_code = null, path_code = null where psdh = #{lsh} and status = '2'
mapper.select: select b.id, b.lsh, b.hh, b.sl, b.lx, b.province, b.city, b.district, b.location, b.phone, b.contact, b.qwsj, b.lrid, b.lrusername, b.truename, a.status, b.driver_code, b.path_code, case b.lx when 0 then '正常' when 1 then '样机' when 2 then '赠品' when 3 then '残次' end as lxInfo, b.lrsj, b.cksj, b.zfsj, b.pcsj, b.fcsj, b.sdsj,b.remark, c.pinm,c.xingh,c.tm, case a.status when 0 then '配送中' when 1 then '已送达' when 2 then '未送达' end as statusInfo From mf_tp_mx a left join mf_th b on a.ddh = b.lsh left join mf_sp c on b.hh=c.hh where a.lsh = #{lsh}

select b.id, b.lsh, b.hh, b.sl, b.lx, b.province, b.city, b.district, b.location, b.phone, b.contact, b.qwsj, b.lrid, b.lrusername, b.truename, b.status, b.driver_code, b.path_code, case b.lx when 0 then '正常' when 1 then '样机' when 2 then '赠品' when 3 then '残次' end as lxInfo, b.lrsj, b.cksj, b.zfsj, b.pcsj, b.fcsj, b.sdsj,b.remark, c.pinm,c.xingh,c.tm, case b.status when 0 then '新增' when 1 then '已提交' when 2 then '已派车' when 3 then '已送达' when 9 then '已作废' end as statusInfo From mf_th b left join mf_sp c on b.hh=c.hh
b.lsh = #{key} or c.pinm like concat('%',#{key},'%') or cast(b.hh as char) = #{key} or b.contact like concat('%',#{key},'%')
and b.status=#{status}
order by b.lsh desc
